TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k oʊ l s t ɛ l ɐ æ s k h ɜː t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ɪ s t ɪ ŋ s w ɪ ɾ ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v θ ɪ k s l aɪ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b ɪ ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ ɹ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɔː f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k iː d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z s s t ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ə t ɹ iː ɹ ʌ ɡ b æ k s æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m ɛ ɾ ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
